title: Interpretation of the appearance of a gecko in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a gecko in a dream: Seeing a gecko is considered one of the visions that cause anxiety and panic for some, but we find that evidence differs in the interpretation of its vision, and what concerns us in this article is clarifying the full meaning and special cases of seeing a dagger in a dream. Interpretation of the appearance of a gecko in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Gecko in a dream: Seeing a gecko in a dream represents going against human nature, treating people harshly, spreading lies and superstitions, and committing sins without repentance or neglect. This vision is an indication of a person who considers faith a cover for his painful actions. Instead of prohibiting evil, we find him ordering its action, and instead of ordering good. We find it preventing him. This vision also indicates evasion, corruption, the spread of forbidden things, and the legality of traveling in illegal ways, showing off, and committing sins. Whoever sees a gecko in his dream, this is an indication of gossip that aims to corrupt people’s minds, spread disputes and disagreements among them, and achieve what he wants by illegal means that are not accepted by custom. If the dreamer sees a gecko eating his meat, this is evidence that there is someone who insults him, overwhelms him, and reminds him of evil in order to spoil his reputation among people, insult his position, and belittle him. If you see a gecko on your way, it symbolizes the enemy, and he expresses his hostility without fear and tells you the extent of his hatred for you and his plots against you. He declares his enmity. On the other hand, seeing Al-Fajja shows that the enemy who holds a grudge against you is of course a weak enemy, but he is skillful and cunning and has abilities that make him turn the tables upside down, with gossip. It sighs, and instills doubts in souls. The gecko in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a garment indicates deception, guilt, violating instinct and religion, following personal whims and satanic obsessions, and reaching the end by any means. This vision is evidence of the hidden hatred that eats away at souls, and the envious eye. Which does not hesitate to harm others, and hostility that reaches the point of conflict. And if the dreamer sees the behavior, this is interpreted by the person who is trying to corrupt his religion and his world by ordering him what the Sharia forbids and forbidding him what the Sharia has commanded. And whoever sees that he is in conflict with the gecko, this is an indication that he He engages in fights and fights without his will, and he has to keep up with fools and immoral people and go through a circle of problems and difficulties in life, not being able to get out of it easily. If one sees a belly walking on the wall of his house, it represents the presence of someone trying to sow discord in the house, distort the truth and lie, and corrupt Life by spreading the spirit of conflict. Between him and his family. This vision also indicates the fears that surround the viewer and prevent him from living normally, and the problems that exacerbate him and become a heavy burden that he cannot bear and resort to the idea of ​​withdrawal or escaping from reality. Zoe. A gecko in a single woman’s dream. Seeing a gecko in a dream symbolizes distress, stagnation, excessive fatigue, the many burdens that he carries without complaint or declaration, and future fears that confuse him. This vision indicates the presence of someone who is hostile to her, and speaks about her from time to time, and reminds her of the bad, and

title: Interpretation of seeing a full bucket in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Bucket, pail or pail is the container used to fill something and it can be used to fill liquids like water etc., or some solid things like sand etc. Seeing a bucket in a dream has many interpretations, depending on whether this bucket is full or empty, and if it is full, what is inside it? We will get to know you personally. What is the different interpretation of seeing the sign of Aquarius and making the dream come true for the senior imams? Interpretation of seeing a full bucket in a dream. The senior imams of dream interpretation indicate that seeing a full bucket in a dream is a praiseworthy vision for the viewer, good news for him, and an indication of the abundance of sustenance that will come to him. Whereas seeing a bucket Empty symbolizes a lack of luck and livelihood, but an empty bucket in a dream is better than seeing a bucket full of dirty water or full of forbidden liquor, because in this case it is a sign that the fortuneteller is committing sins and disobedience. Also, seeing a bucket full of pots and dishes is considered good news for the dreamer about heaviness. His scales in the afterlife, and the abundance of his good deeds in this world. As for the full and light bucket, it symbolizes the emptying of the heart of good deeds, the abundance of sins and transgressions, and the pursuit of one’s desires. If the bucket in the dream is filled with some fruit, this indicates that the sleeper will be able to reap the fruits of his labor and hard work. Seeing a bucket full of rice is a good vision and good news. Seeing a bucket full of fruits and food in a knowledge seeker’s dream is good news of excellence and success. If the fortuneteller is sick and sees in his dream a bucket full of fruits and vegetables, this indicates his recovery from illness. Interpretation of seeing a full bucket in A dream for a single woman: The vision of an unmarried girl, if she sees in her dream that she is filling a bucket from a well, and filling it with water to the brim, explains that what she does in life brings her good and good livelihood that is sufficient for her. She and sings to her asking for help from others. For an unmarried woman to see in her dream that someone she does not know gives her a full bucket, this means her imminent marriage to a wealthy young man, of morals and religion, and one of status or power. If a girl dreams that she is filling a bucket from a well, but she She notices that the bucket empties of water every time she fills it, as this indicates that she is wasting her time and effort doing something useless. Despite her exhaustion, the dream warns her against devoting her effort and time to work that brings her benefits. When an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is filling a bucket with water for washing, this indicates that she will be able to get rid of the difficulties she is currently facing and alleviate her worries. If she is sick, this is good news of her recovery, God willing. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a gun in a dream Fahd Al-Osaimi 2021 Interpretation of seeing a full bucket in a dream for a married woman A married woman who sees a full bucket in a dream is a good vision and good news about the means of livelihood and profit that her husband will reap from work or Trade that will benefit her and her family from that. And if he sees that he is trying to fill the bucket, but he does not fill it to the end, then this is explained by the fact that he is not achieving what he wants at the moment. If she dreams that she is bored

title: Interpretation of eating grilled meat in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: In this article, we provide you in detail with the interpretation of eating grilled meat in a dream for a married woman. Seeing eating all kinds of food is one of the common visions we have in the dream world, which dreamers believe are simple dreams that do just that. It does not provide any interpretation to the dreamer except that it is a sign of the desire to eat it in reality. But seeing food in a dream is one of the visions that carries many different interpretations for the dreamer, which vary between abhorrent and desirable interpretations. But what did the jurists say about eating grilled meat in a dream for a married woman? Eating grilled meat in a dream for a married woman. Dream interpretation scholars have stated that seeing grilled meat for a married woman in a dream is one of the hateful dreams that indicate marital discord. Unlike the previous vision, in the case of eating grilled meat, this vision symbolizes the end of the problems and fears that he suffers from. The dreamer. If she eats lamb meat in a dream, this vision is good news for a married woman to achieve what she desires in reality, and if she eats it with her husband, this indicates the stability of marital life. If a married woman dreams that she is grilling very good meat, then this dream deserves praise and expresses kindness. And food. But if you buy or sell grilled meat in a dream, this vision indicates that you are going through crises and problems. We present to you the most important things mentioned in the interpretation of eating grilled meat in a dream for a married woman, and at the end of this article we note that all of these mentioned interpretations are nothing but The jurisprudence of dream interpretation, and this means that we cannot be sure of their realization on the ground because only God knows the unseen, and for another interpretation of dreams, you can download the immediate application for dream interpretation from the encyclopedia.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a flood in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: A flood in a dream is an outburst of anger, major problems and fears that the dreamer faces and in some cases it can bring a good and abundant source of livelihood. Many dream scholars interpreted seeing a flood of water or the sea in a dream as igniting family problems, and in a marital dream a sign of crises and tension with her husband, perhaps reaching divorce and drowning in a woman’s dream is nothing but bad, evil, and annulment of engagements, and in some places the flood is interpreted as a reflection of subconscious thoughts And psychological problems of vision. In this article, you have everything related to seeing the flood in a dream in detail. The flood in a dream by Ibn SirinImam Ibn Sirin explained the view of the flood in a dream as the seriousness of the disease and the big problems that the dreamer is already facing and can harm the dreamer and his family. The flood of the entire city brings a lot of evil It indicates wars and the many problems facing the city and may reflect seeing the enemy attacking the country. If a person sees a flood in his dream and tries to keep it away from the house, this indicates many enemies, envy, and a desire to get rid of them soon. The flood and deluge of water is a sign of God’s torment and God’s intense wrath. On the dreamer and his family and it may reflect the evil and misfortunes that the villagers receive. A flood in a woman’s dream. Seeing a flood in the dream of a girl who has never been alone is a sign of good character. The repeated attempt of single people to escape from the flood indicates getting rid of life’s troubles and problems, and perhaps getting out of the flood is a sign On a close marriage, especially when someone helps her with it. Seeing a disaster from afar, in some way, is evidence of many praiseworthy changes and changes in her life and she may soon reach the dreams and aspirations she seeks. A raft in a married woman’s dream. The sight of a married woman shows a flood. Water in a dream about family stability, abundance of happiness with the husband and escape from the flood, what is the cure for illness and happiness after fatigue. A married woman’s vision of a flood inside her home indicates that she and her husband have a lot of goods and livelihoods and she can find a special job that will bring her happiness and sufficient money. Floods that enter the country or city with bad, evil and unhealthy visions for a married woman bring many worries and problems and perhaps for her and her family. A white flood that is not mixed with red and black is good in its meaning. Interpretation of a dream about a flood in a pregnant woman’s dream. Seeing floods in a pregnant woman’s dream interprets the abundance of goodness and peace. Which are blessed by God’s will. A flood in a dream is safe for her and the fetus and may indicate a male child. A pregnant woman escaping from a flood in a dream is just a repeated attempt to get rid of the problems and fears that she suffers from. Interpretation of seeing a flood in a dream for single people. A young man who sees a flood in a dream is A testament to the faith of a friend. Swimming alone in a flood is an indication of suffering, fatigue, and major problems, and this vision can reflect injustice and corruption. The young man’s attempt to escape from

title: Interpretation of a dream about someone being arrested by the police

preview.html: They do not know the correct meaning and do not know whether it will be a good dream or not and we will explain that to you later. Interpretation of a dream about someone being arrested by the police according to Al-Nabulsi Sometimes a dream about someone being arrested by the police is considered a strange dream, but Al-Nabulsi explains this through the following points: The Great Dream Interpreter Al-Nabulsi confirms that the interpretation of the encounter with the police in a dream. It is seen as a success of the test and enjoyment of life, as the police are a symbol of testing good principles. As for whoever sees the police stopping him, this dream indicates the success of the person with this vision in life from the conspiracies and misfortunes that befell him. As for someone who sees a smiling policeman in a dream, this is a warning sign that he needs to take care of himself, because something could harm him. On the other hand, the appearance of a policeman in a dream could be a sign of the security and happiness experienced by the owner of this vision. You may be interested in: Interpretation of a dream about escaping from the police. Interpretation of a dream about a policeman in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about someone being arrested by the police. In a single dream, many signs appear, including the following: When she sees the police in a single woman’s dream. This is evidence that she will marry a husband who will give her the peace of mind and stability that This girl is looking for him. However, seeing the girl giving the morning salute to a policeman. This indicates that he has been promoted at work or has obtained the highest grades and grades in education. It is also said that the interpretation of police dreams for a single woman indicates the approaching marriage of the girl, and that she will get married. From a man of strong character. On the other hand, Al-Nabulsi is also said that if an unmarried girl sees the police in her dream. This indicates that she is a girl of good character, apart from having a good reputation. On the other hand, when a girl sees a policeman arresting her. This indicates The dream indicates that there is an upcoming conflict or that something bad will happen to her and whether the policeman has a weapon or not. This dream also shows happiness in the new life that this girl is entering. We chose for you: Interpretation of seeing a policeman or policeman in a dream and its meaningInterpretation of the appearance of the police in a dream for a young man consideredInterpretation The dream of a person being arrested by the police, from the point of view of many scholars, is among the things that can lead to good or evil, depending on the circumstances of the vision, among them: The interpretation of the dream shows that the police are arresting a young man. It indicates that the person is carrying out the wrong or prohibited activity. And he needs to get back to what he is doing. But if someone sees him, another person is arrested by the police in the dream. The dream indicates that the young man’s wedding day is approaching. It can also be interpreted as a perception of someone in the dream. With the fact that the owner of this vision has a place in His work and that the employer stays with this person until the end. The interpretation of someone who is arrested by the police may be that there is a problem that is tightly controlling his life. And if he is able to escape from the police, this gives him the ability to get rid of this problem. Interpretation of a dream about a married man being arrested Before the police: Interpretation of a dream about someone being arrested by the police, and this person is her husband, and this indicates

title: Interpretation of seeing tomatoes in a dream

preview.html: Seeing tomatoes in the solution is considered a good thing for the dreamer, as it indicates an important breakthrough and a positive change in the situation. Seeing abundant tomato fruits indicates that the dreamer’s money will increase and promises great happiness that will accompany him in all stages of his life. If a single person sees tomatoes in his dream, he will establish a relationship New and falls in love. The shape of a tomato in a dream also indicates the shape of the dreamer’s wife. If it is red and fresh, this indicates that he will marry a beautiful girl from a respectable family. On the other hand, if the tomato is rotten, this indicates his marriage to a disabled woman with many defects. Dreaming of tomatoes with a beautiful and attractive shape portends goodness, blessings and happiness to the person who dreams. Seeing tomatoes in a dream If a person is sick and dreams of eating tomatoes and they taste delicious and healthy, this indicates his recovery from the disease. It also indicates that he will enjoy good health in the future. If the dreamer sees himself He plays with tomatoes in a dream, this indicates that he is wasting money and is unable to save money. It also indicates that he is a person who is unable to take responsibility for himself. However, if he sees in a dream that he is cutting tomatoes, this indicates that the dreamer is suffering from confusion in his life and is making wrong decisions and does not Countless things cause him harm. If the dreamer uses a knife to cut tomatoes, this indicates his separation from those close to him. The dreamer who throws tomatoes in a dream indicates his recklessness and joy in life and that he commits many countless things. Interpretation of seeing tomatoes in a dream according to Imam Al-SadiqThe Imam explains The truth is that an unmarried girl seeing a round, beautiful-looking tomato means that her life will be constantly renewed. It also indicates that she will find a way out of many problems in her life and that she will find happiness wherever she goes. If a married woman dreams of a ripe, open tomato, this indicates that she will have relationships. Strong at the family level. It also indicates that she has a strong relationship with her children. This indicates the woman’s social intelligence and her ability to involve others and the happiness of others when dealing with her. Contrary to all interpreters’ interpretations. Imam Al-Sadiq explained that red tomatoes in a pregnancy’s dream are evidence that she gave birth to a girl and not a boy. Interpretation of cooking tomatoes in a dream Seeing cooked tomatoes in a dream indicates a state of comfort that a person feels when he gets rid of pain, sadness, and bitterness. A person who stumbles in reality and sees tomatoes in his dream Cooked, his circumstances will improve, his affairs will be corrected, and his circumstances will develop and advance for the better. The meaning of picking tomatoes in a dream When one sees himself picking tomatoes from the tree, this indicates his suffering and his long search for earning a living and amassing money. In the case of watching a school student picking tomatoes then If he picks them, it means that he has obtained a large sum as his academic progress and brilliance are shown. Dreaming about picking tomatoes and storing them indicates the great profit that the dreamer will achieve after a lot of effort and suffering. When you see tomatoes being picked and kept, this indicates that the person enjoys...
preview.text: Seeing tomatoes in the solution is considered a good thing for the dreamer, as it indicates an important breakthrough and a positive change in the situation. Seeing abundant tomato fruits indicates that the dreamer’s money will increase and promises great happiness that will accompany him in all stages of his life. If a single person sees tomatoes in his dream, he will establish a relationship New and falls in love. The shape of a tomato in a dream also indicates the shape of the dreamer’s wife. If it is red and fresh, this indicates that he will marry a beautiful girl from a respectable family. On the other hand, if the tomato is rotten, this indicates his marriage to a disabled woman with many defects. Dreaming of tomatoes with a beautiful and attractive shape portends goodness, blessings and happiness to the person who dreams. Seeing tomatoes in a dream If a person is sick and dreams of eating tomatoes and they taste delicious and healthy, this indicates his recovery from the disease. It also indicates that he will enjoy good health in the future. If the dreamer sees himself He plays with tomatoes in a dream, this indicates that he is wasting money and is unable to save money. It also indicates that he is a person who is unable to take responsibility for himself. However, if he sees in a dream that he is cutting tomatoes, this indicates that the dreamer is suffering from confusion in his life and is making wrong decisions and does not Countless things cause him harm. If the dreamer uses a knife to cut tomatoes, this indicates his separation from those close to him. The dreamer who throws tomatoes in a dream indicates his recklessness and joy in life and that he commits many countless things. Interpretation of seeing tomatoes in a dream according to Imam Al-SadiqThe Imam explains The truth is that an unmarried girl seeing a round, beautiful-looking tomato means that her life will be constantly renewed. It also indicates that she will find a way out of many problems in her life and that she will find happiness wherever she goes. If a married woman dreams of a ripe, open tomato, this indicates that she will have relationships. Strong at the family level. It also indicates that she has a strong relationship with her children. This indicates the woman’s social intelligence and her ability to involve others and the happiness of others when dealing with her. Contrary to all interpreters’ interpretations. Imam Al-Sadiq explained that red tomatoes in a pregnancy’s dream are evidence that she gave birth to a girl and not a boy. Interpretation of cooking tomatoes in a dream Seeing cooked tomatoes in a dream indicates a state of comfort that a person feels when he gets rid of pain, sadness, and bitterness. A person who stumbles in reality and sees tomatoes in his dream Cooked, his circumstances will improve, his affairs will be corrected, and his circumstances will develop and advance for the better. The meaning of picking tomatoes in a dream When one sees himself picking tomatoes from the tree, this indicates his suffering and his long search for earning a living and amassing money. In the case of watching a school student picking tomatoes then If he picks them, it means that he has obtained a large sum as his academic progress and brilliance are shown. Dreaming about picking tomatoes and storing them indicates the great profit that the dreamer will achieve after a lot of effort and suffering. When you see tomatoes being picked and kept, this indicates that the person enjoys...

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a woman marrying Ibn Sirin to someone other than her husband?  The interpretation of a dream about marriage for a woman married to a foreigner, and the interpretation of a dream for a woman married to another man

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of a married woman getting married without her husband There are many strange things that one can encounter in the world of dreams, because it contains many imaginary or unrealistic things, for example, that a married woman finds her marriage to a man other than her husband, and we discuss in this article the interpretation. From this dream and the connotations associated with it. Interpretation of a dream of a married woman marrying without her husband by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of a dream of a married woman marrying without her husband Some people, especially women, expect that a woman’s marriage to someone other than her husband in a dream is one of the things that indicate problems and obstacles, but most likely the woman faces many benefits and enters life in her life while she sees this vision. Among the interpretations of this dream is the abundance of goodness that penetrates the married woman and her home in the event of a lack of money, this crisis is resolved and the money that she and her husband will receive increases. It can be said that in the event of thinking about a new job or moving to another home, this is for the married woman when she saw her marriage to someone other than the husband, and God knows best. If she faces some tension about raising her children and the difficulty of training them, she finds it easy and simple to teach them and her relationship with them improves. Among the connotations of this vision is that it is one of the signs of achieving big and different dreams, especially if she is associated with a man of authority and a distinguished social status. If this husband is an elderly man, the subject is a sign of many blessings and the collection of happiness and abundant goodness in her future, God willing. Interpretation of a dream of a married woman marrying without her husband from Ibn Sirin The great scholar Ibn Sirin predicts that there are many different and happy things awaiting a married woman if she witnesses her marriage to someone other than her husband. This dream is good for all family members for the good that comes to them and the benefits that reach their door. As for childbirth and planning for pregnancy, the matter is easy and the woman achieves her desire, so if she thinks about the female, God will give her what she wants and vice versa. It goes to the issue of the son's marriage if the woman has children, if she returns to her marriage to a man who is not her partner. There are many factors of happiness and pleasure in the life of this woman and her small family if she finds this dream, because Ibn Sirin explains many positive things that light up life with this vision. Go to the Egyptian dream interpretation site from Google and search for all the interpretations of dreams that are getting worse. Interpretation of a dream of marriage for a married woman to a strange man If a woman dreams that she is marrying a strange man in addition to her husband, there are great chances that something unpopular in her life will change for the better. She was able to overcome all these negative things and turn them into more positive things, in addition to improving her relationship with her family. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman marrying another man If a woman sees that another man proposes to her and the husband agrees to this matter and marries her to that person, then the vision is interpreted as good for the husband because he gets many benefits

title: Interpretation of cooking in a dream by Ibn Sirin and senior scholars

preview.html: Cooking in a dream: Cooking is preparing food and lighting it to eat. There are many methods and methods of cooking that vary according to the individual’s desires and preferences. Seeing cooking in a dream has many interpretations and connotations that differ among the dreamer. Being a man or a woman and other symbols that we will explain in detail in the following lines of the article. Cooking in a dream Seeing cooking in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer is a sensible and intelligent person who has many good qualities and a fragrant reputation among people. And if someone dreams that he enters the kitchen and starts cooking, this is a sign However, he will enter a new job that will bring him a lot of money and he will be promoted to many high positions. If you see in a dream that you are cooking many types of oriental food, this means that the date of your marriage to a good girl with virtuous morals is approaching. If you are a science student and you see In a dream that you are cooking, this is a sign of your superiority over your colleagues, reaching the highest levels of knowledge and your ability to satisfy all your desires. Cooking spoiled food during sleep leads the dreamer to face many problems, difficulties and obstacles that disrupt his life and cause him depression and sadness. Cooking in a dream for a son Imam Ibn Sirin - may God have mercy on him - explained that seeing cooking in a dream is a sign of fulfilling dreams, achieving goals and desires, and living with happiness and peace of mind. If a person sees during sleep that he is cooking food and it is not cooked, this is a sign that he is facing some difficulties and crises that prevent him from achieving To what he wants and wants. If you see in a dream that you are cooking a wonderful feast of food, this symbolizes wonderful food and an abundance of goodness coming your way and hearing a lot of good news that will change his life for the better. If you cook unappetizing food in the dream, this proves that the dreamer will face a health problem It is dangerous in the coming period and he will face many problems and fears that disturb his life. If you dream that you are cooking bird meat, this means that the difficult period you are going through will end, you will recover from diseases and you will be in good health. Cooking in a dream Fahd Al-Osaimi Dr. Fahm Al-Osaimi mentioned in his interpretation of the vision of cooking In a dream, it is a sign of easy circumstances, achieving success, fulfilling desires, and getting a lot of money and charity. If you see yourself in your dream cooking fatty food, this is a sign that you are getting a lot of money, but from an illegal source. When a merchant dreams that he is cooking food and serving it To his friends, this is a sign that he will enter into a profitable business that will bring him a lot of money. What is the interpretation of cooking in one dream? If a girl sees herself cooking in a dream, this is a sign of her ability to fulfill her desires and achieve the happiness she deserves. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is cooking This will lead to her marriage, which will take place soon, God willing, and she will live in comfort and stability with her partner. If the fiancée sees in her dream that she is cooking delicious food, this is a sign that her wedding date is approaching, and if she is cooking bread and she is happy, this proves that her partner will have the passion.

title: Interpretation of a dream about climbing a tree

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about climbing a tree in a dream We may want to know the interpretation of a dream about climbing a tree in a dream, one of the dreams that many wanted to know the interpretation of this dream. In interpretations, but by diligent scholars who seek to interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream of climbing a tree in a dream: Anyone who dreams of climbing a tall tree may indicate the happiness and joys that the dreamer will feel in his life at that time. Dreaming of climbing trees in a dream may indicate happy events that It comes to the dreamer during this period. Climbing trees in a dream can indicate the honor that the dreamer will receive and a lot of pride. If one sees himself climbing a tree in a dream, this may indicate the will and determination that the dreamer had in his life at that time, and God I know. Interpretation of a dream about the moon rising in a dream: It is possible that seeing the moon rising in a dream indicates that he is a just person who loves goodness for everyone. If a person sees himself climbing the moon in a dream, this may indicate many happy things that are happening in his life at that time Seeing the moon rising in a dream can mean good changes that are occurring in your life these days. Seeing the moon rising in a dream means getting rid of the worry and anxiety that the dreamer was suffering from at that time. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about climbing the Kaaba in a dream: Seeing someone climbing the roof of the Kaaba may indicate good skin that the dreamer will acquire during these days. It is possible that seeing someone climbing the Kaaba in a dream indicates the dreamer’s sins and he must repent and approach God, Blessed and Most High. Standing On the roof of the Kaaba in a dream may indicate some stumbles and obstacles in one’s life during this time, and God knows best. A person’s dream that he was standing at the door of the Kaaba may indicate the abundance of goodness that he will obtain in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about climbing a large rock In a dream: Climbing a large rock in a dream may indicate working hard to achieve goals and ambitions during this time. Seeing yourself climbing a large rock in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s achievements in life during this period. A person’s dream that he was climbing a large rock in a dream may indicate A promotion at work or a position will be acquired by the dreamer during that period. If one saw that he was climbing a large rock in a dream, he will overcome the difficulties and problems that the dreamer is facing at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about climbing a tree without leaves in a dream: A dream about climbing a tree without leaves may indicate Leaves indicate some difficult things that the dreamer is facing in his life at that time. If someone is seen climbing a tree without leaves in a dream, this may indicate difficult days that the dreamer is going through and one must be careful. In the case of a dream of climbing trees without leaves, This may indicate the dreamer’s bad luck and suffering during this period. A person’s dream that he was climbing a tree but there were no leaves indicates the bad changes that occur in his life in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation
